雂字的基本解释

雂
qín
古同“鳹”。

雂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qín］
［《廣韻》巨今切，平侵，羣。］
［《廣韻》巨淹切，平鹽，羣。］
(1)鸟名。
(2)为人名用字。春秋时有公子苦雂。见《左传·昭公二十一年》。

雂字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雂； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1365第03
【唐韻】巨淹切【集韻】其淹切，?音箝。【說文】鳥也。【廣韻】白喙鳥。本作鳹。　又【廣韻】巨金切【集韻】渠金切，?音琴。又【集韻】枯含切，音堪。又枯南切，音弇。又胡南切，音含。義?同。　又【集韻】五甘切，音玵。人名。【左傳·昭二十一年】齊師宋師敗吳師于鴻口，獲其二帥，公子苦雂偃州員。○按釋文，雂，古含反。　【篇海】譌作?。

雂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
雂字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
qín
The ancient same "snakes".
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qín］
["Guangyun" Jujin cut, flat invasion, group. ]
["Guangyun" giant flooded cut, flat salt, group. ]
(1) The name of the bird.
(2) Use words for names. In the Spring and Autumn Period, there was a son of bitterness. See "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan · Zhao Gong".
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【隹字部】　雂; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1365 No. 03
[Tang Yun] Juyan cut [Ji Yun] its drown cut, sound pliers. [Said the text] The bird is also. [Guangyun] White-beaked bird. This is a snail.　[Guangyun] Giant Jinqie [Jiyun] Qu Jinqie,? Yinqin. Also 【Jiyun】Withered and cut, the sound is good. And cut south, sound 弇. And Hu Nanqie, Yinhan. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Five Gan cuts, sound 玵. Person's name. [Zuo Twenty-first Year] The Master of Qi Shi Song defeated Master Wu Yu Hongkou, and was the second commander. ○According to the interpretation, Qiong, Gu Hananti.　【Pianhai】Zhao Zuo?.
